summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4710 for the improvement of Poplar Place, from Dearborn Street to Charles Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 54529, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
